text: Ludwig van Beethoven's Piano Sonata No. 20 in G major, Op. 49, No. 2, is a piece of music for solo piano. It was written in 1797 and published in 1805 along with Sonata No. 19. Tovey, D.F. (1931) Commentary on Beethoven's Piano Sonatas, London, ABRSM.Ball, P. (2010) The Music Instinct, London, The Bodley Head ==Form== The sonata is in two sections, called movements: ==References== Piano Sonata 020 Category:Compositions in G major
title: Piano Sonata No. 20 (Beethoven)
